## Introduction

In this small presentation I will show the evolution of marriages vs divorces in
the city of Brussels.

The data was retrieved from [Open Data Brussels](https://opendata.brussel.be/explore/dataset/demografische-statistieken/information/?sort=annee&%3D%3D) on 08 july 2017.

```{r, echo=FALSE}
demographics = read.csv("https://opendata.brussel.be/explore/dataset/demografische-statistieken/download/?format=csv&timezone=Europe/Berlin&use_labels_for_header=true", sep=";")
```

## Plot

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
g = ggplot(demographics, aes(x = Jaar)) +
    geom_line(aes(y = Gevierde.huwelijken, color = "Marriages")) +
    geom_line(aes(y = Echtscheidingen, color = "Divorces")) +
    labs(x = "Year", y = "Count", title = "Marriages vs Divorces in Brussels")

g = ggplotly(g)
style(g, hoverinfo = "x+y")
```
